successes.title: Murder By Death's album "Big Dark Love" & Poster Art Book
successes.description: Pre-selling our last album on Kickstarter was so fun that we are doing it again for our new album AND an MBD poster art book!

Pledges.description: SPLIT 7" w/ SAMANTHA CRAIN. She covers our song, we cover hers. Sixth in our series. Comes with digital DL. INCLUDES SHIPPING TO U.S.
DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF OUR NEW ALBUM "BIG DARK LOVE". No add-ons.
CD OF OUR NEW ALBUM "BIG DARK LOVE". Add $5 if you want the MBD/Samantha Crain split 7". INCLUDES SHIPPING TO U.S.

STANDARD VINYL PRESSING OF OUR NEW ALBUM "BIG DARK LOVE". 180 gram vinyl in a full color jacket. Includes digital download. Add $5 if you want the MBD/Samantha Crain split 7". INCLUDES SHIPPING TO U.S.

SPECIAL EDITION VINYL PRESSING OF OUR NEW ALBUM "BIG DARK LOVE". 180 gram colored vinyl in a mirrored foil jacket...Includes digital download & comes with a kickstarter-only MBD slipmat cover! Add $5 if you want the MBD/Samantha Crain split 7".
INCLUDES SHIPPING TO U.S.

CD OF "BIG DARK LOVE" & A TSHIRT. You can specify the size once the kickstarter is done. Add $5 if you want the MBD/Samantha Crain split 7".
INCLUDES SHIPPING TO U.S.

SPECIAL EDITION VINYL OF "BIG DARK LOVE" plus T-SHIRT.  -- 180 gram colored vinyl in a mirrored foil jacket...You get a shirt too. You can specify the size once the kickstarter is done. Add $5 if you want the MBD/Samantha Crain split 7".
INCLUDES SHIPPING TO U.S.

ONE (1) TICKET TO SEE MBD PERFORM FRIDAY, JUNE 5, 2015 IN A SECRET UNDERGROUND CAVERN IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY + A SCREENED EVENT POSTER. 150 tickets available to this private event. You also get a screened show poster. There will be "brown beverage" bar. AMAZING. Show will be Friday, June 5, 2015. Will Call only. Add $30 for special edition vinyl of Big Dark Love, Add $65 for Framed: The Poster Art of MBD.

ONE (1) TICKET TO SEE MBD PERFORM SATURDAY, JUNE 6, 2015 IN A SECRET UNDERGROUND CAVERN IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY + A SCREENED EVENT POSTER. 150 tickets available to this private event. You also get a screened show poster. There will be "brown beverage" bar. AMAZING. Show will be Saturday, June 6, 2015. Will Call only. Add $30 for special edition vinyl of Big Dark Love,Add $65 for Framed: The Poster Art of MBD.

ONE (1) TICKET TO SEE MBD PERFORM SUNDAY, JUNE 7, 2015 (7pm) IN A SECRET UNDERGROUND CAVERN IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY + A SCREENED EVENT POSTER + A copy of BIG DARK LOVE SPECIAL EDITION VINYL. 150 tickets available to this private event. You also get a screened show poster. There will be "brown beverage" bar. AMAZING. Show will be Sunday, June 7, 2015. Will Call only. Add $65 for Framed: The Poster Art of MBD.

TWO (2) TICKETS TO SEE MBD PERFORM SATURDAY, JUNE 6, 2015 IN A SECRET UNDERGROUND CAVERN IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY + A SCREENED EVENT POSTER. 150 tickets available to this private event. You also get a screened show poster. There will be "brown beverage" bar. AMAZING. Show will be Saturday, June 6, 2015. Will Call only. Add $30 for special edition vinyl of Big Dark Love, Add $65 for Framed: The Poster Art of MBD.

TWO (2) TICKETS TO SEE MBD PERFORM FRIDAY, JUNE 5, 2015 IN A SECRET UNDERGROUND CAVERN IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY + A SCREENED EVENT POSTER. 150 tickets available to this private event. You also get a screened show poster. There will be "brown beverage" bar. AMAZING. Show will be Friday, June 5, 2015. Will Call only. Add $30 for special edition vinyl of Big Dark Love, Add $65 for Framed: The Poster Art of MBD.
ONE (1) COPY OF OUR ART BOOK "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MURDER BY DEATH", SPECIAL EDITION VINYL PRESSING OF "BIG DARK LOVE" & THE SPLIT 7".

TWO (2) TICKETS TO SEE MBD PERFORM SUNDAY, JUNE 7, 2015 (7pm) IN A SECRET UNDERGROUND CAVERN IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY + A SCREENED EVENT POSTER + A copy of BIG DARK LOVE SPECIAL EDITION VINYL. 150 tickets available to this private event. You also get a screened show poster. There will be "brown beverage" bar. AMAZING. Show will be Sunday, June 7, 2015. Will Call only. Add $65 for Framed: The Poster Art of MBD.

MBD WHISKEY CREW! LIMITED EDITION KICKSTARTER POSTER SIGNED BY MBD + A WHISKEY CREW T-TSHIRT + THE NEW SE VINYL OF "BIG DARK LOVE" + A COPY OF OUR ART BOOK "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MURDER BY DEATH", THE SPLIT 7" & A BADASS 4" WHISKEY CREW PATCH. Wear your patch to one of our shows and we will have goodies for you!
INCLUDES SHIPPING TO U.S. -- Only available in this Kickstarter promo. Art by Ryan Browne/ printed by Screwball Press.

COMIC ARTIST RYAN BROWNE (7 posters featured in this book!) will draw a one of a kind illustration in your copy of "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MURDER BY DEATH" plus MBD WHISKEY CREW! LIMITED EDITION KICKSTARTER POSTER SIGNED BY MBD + A WHISKEY CREW T-TSHIRT + THE NEW SE VINYL OF "BIG DARK LOVE" + THE SPLIT 7" & A BADASS 4" WHISKEY CREW PATCH. Wear your patch to one of our shows and we will have goodies for you! 
INCLUDES SHIPPING TO U.S. -- Only available in this Kickstarter promo. Art by Ryan Browne/ printed by Screwball Press.

ALL SEVEN MBD ALBUMS ON 180 GRAM VINYL + THE ART BOOK "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MURDER BY DEATH", THE POSTER, SPLIT 7", & MBD WHISKEY CREW T-SHIRT & PATCH. (Including the new special edition of album "BIG DARK LOVE"). -- Here's what you get... Like The Exorcist, But More Breakdancing. Who Will Survive and What Will Be Left of Them?. In Bocca Al Lupo. Red of Tooth and Claw. Good Morning, Magpie. Bitter Drink Bitter Moon. Big Dark Love SE version, Live DVD. Pretty straight forward. Lots of MBD music! PLUS YOU GET THE LIMITED MBD POSTER & MBD WHISKEY CREW T-SHIRT & PATCH.

ONE COPY OF A TEST PRESSING FOR VARIOUS MBD VINYL RELEASES WITH HANDMADE JACKET ART BY SARAH, THE SPECIAL EDITION OF "BIG DARK LOVE", A COPY OF "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MBD", THE SPLIT 7", THE LIMITED POSTER, & A WHISKEY CREW T-SHIRT & PATCH.
In the interest of not clogging up this digital real estate, all the test pressings will be available in this reward space. Specify which one you want (after you have checked out) by contacting us through Kickstarter. The list of test pressings available is at the bottom of the FAQ section on this kickstarter page. I will update as they sell.

1 YEAR SUBSCRIPTION TO THE MBD MYSTERY PACKAGE SUPER FUNTIME CLUB, + SE VINYL OF "BIG DARK LOVE", "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MBD" , THE SIGNED POSTER, SPLIT 7", & WHISKEY CREW T-SHIRT & PATCH. Every other month for a year you will receive a package that contains some of our favorite things- anything from books to food to movies or knickknacks! It will include a special rare 7" only avail through this club. This is gonna be super fun.

GOLDEN TICKET. TICKETS TO ANY FUTURE MBD CLUB SHOWS. (Festivals and Stanley Hotel shows Not Included). -- We will buy you tickets to any and all of the MBD shows you can handle. PLUS YOU GET THE NEW SE VINYL OF "BIG DARK LOVE", FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MBD", THE LIMITED MBD POSTER, THE SPLIT 7" & MBD WHISKEY CREW T-SHIRT & PATCH. Plus get a cool golden ticket.

MBD FOREVER CLUB Any music or special items we print, we just mail to you (vinyl, CD's, flasks, pint glasses, belt buckles, reissues whatever). PLUS YOU GET ALL OUR ALBUMS ON VINYL, "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MBD", THE LIMITED MBD POSTER, THE SPLIT 7", & THE MBD WHISKEY CREW T-SHIRT & PATCH
INCLUDES SHIPPING TO THE U.S.

MBD COVERS ANY SONG YOU REQUEST. PART 2. You pick the song. We record it. We will also hand make a CD case for you and give you the only copy of it. The digital will be online for others to hear but you have the only copy! PLUS YOU GET ALL OUR ALBUMS ON VINYL, "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MBD", THE LIMITED MBD POSTER, THE SPLIT 7", & THE MBD WHISKEY CREW TSHIRT & PATCH

WE'RE GOIN' TO GRACELAND- IN MEMPHIS, TENNESSEE. We'll fly you and a friend to Memphis, where we will eat bbq, go to Graceland, and hit the town. We'll play you a couple songs all acoustic like. Hotel and flight included. PLUS YOU GET ALL OUR ALBUMS ON VINYL, "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MBD", THE LIMITED MBD POSTER, THE SPLIT 7", & THE MBD WHISKEY CREW T-SHIRT & PATCH.

SARAH AND ADAM FROM MBD WILL PERFORM IN YOUR LIVING ROOM/BASEMENT ETC in the USA. (travel costs included in fee). -- We will come to perform at your house for a show with your friends. Or for just you. Whatever. This fee is for anywhere in the USA. We promise to do it (on a date we agree on together) before the end of 2015. We are also happy to do international shows! Email us at mbdband@gmail.com if you want to discuss international shows. PLUS YOU GET ALL OUR ALBUMS ON VINYL, "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MBD", THE LIMITED MBD POSTER, THE SPLIT 7", THE MBD WHISKEY CREW T-SHIRT & PATCH, AND A GOLDEN TICKET.

CEDAR POINT. ROUND TWO! GO TO THE WORLD'S BEST ROLLERCOASTER PARK WITH US. We did this as part of our last kickstarter and it was incredible. We are ready to go again. Flights and accommodations for two included (from anywhere in North America.) We will book your hotel and take care of all expenses at the park. PLUS YOU GET ALL OUR ALBUMS ON VINYL, "FRAMED: THE POSTER ART OF MBD", THE LIMITED MBD POSTER, THE SPLIT 7", & THE MBD WHISKEY CREW T-SHIRT & PATCH.
KENTUCKY DERBY/"BROWN BEVERAGE" TASTING PARTY/PRIVATE SHOW!!!
We fly you and a friend (from anywhere in the continental US) to Louisville Kentucky for the craziest horse race in the country.
